    • setMethodKey

      public static void setMethodKey(String methodKey)
      set the method key the socket is waiting
      参数:
      methodKey - the specific method name the socket is waiting

    • setMethodReturn

      public static void setMethodReturn(boolean methodReturn)
      set the method return
      参数:
      methodReturn - if the method return is true or false

    • makeClientWait

      public void makeClientWait()
      This method set the Attribute WAIT_SOCKET to true

    • waitingMethodReturn

      public void waitingMethodReturn(String method)
      While the WAIT_SOCKET is true the Client main thread will wait until the socket Receives a Return of the method
      参数:
      method - the specific method name the socket is waiting

    • joinGame

      public boolean joinGame(int matchID)
      Join a game
      参数:
      matchID - the match id to join
      返回:
      true if success, else false

      参数:

      返回:
      true if success, else false

      返回:
